title: You want to start practicing ADC, but you don't know who to play?
body:
Don't worry! I'm here to help you out!

You want a very safe playstyle with constent mobility and good kiting?
*Pick Lucian*

You need to out-trade the enemy ADC with a good burst of damage?
*Pick Lucian*

You need a good wave-clear to out-push the enemy ADC?
*Pick Lucian*

You want to poke the other ADC, so he'll get behind and leave his turret?
*Pick Lucian*

You want to have a very good early game, while scaling pretty good late game?
*Pick Lucian*

Here, it's done! I hope I helped you for your future ADC games! Have fun :)
